JSONtools - Class in pl.put.poznan.JSON.logic
The JSONtools class provides utility methods for JSON processing, such as transforming JSON text to uppercase, pretty-printing JSON, and filtering JSON objects based on specific properties.
JSONtools(String[]) - Constructor for class pl.put.poznan.JSON.logic.JSONtools
Constructs a JSONtools instance with the specified JSON text.
